function.name: thermostatMode_turnOff
function.description: This function is used to turn off the thermostat mode.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to turn off the thermostat mode.

predefinedThermostatMode.description: The predefined thermostat mode to be turned off.

mode.description: The mode to be turned off.
